TEXT.TITLE: COUPON REDUCED ON BEST DENKI WARRANT BOND
TEXT.BODY: The coupon on the 70 mln dlr equity warrant eurobond for Best Denki Co Ltd has been set at three pct compared with the indicated 3-1/8 pct, lead manager Nikko Securities Co (Europe) Ltd said. The exercise price was set 1,640 yen per share, representing a premium of 2-1/2 pct over today's closing price of 1,600 yen. The foreign exchange rate was set at 154.40 yen to the U.S. Dollar. The five-year deal is priced at par. REUTER
